General.Name: Single Well Industrial
General.Description: Single Well Industrial Corporation designs, produces, and sells molds and auto machines in Taiwan. The company offers semi-conductor and LED molding, IC molding, deflashing, trimming, and forming dies, as well as parts of dies, including overhauling on molding dies. It also provides deflash/trim/singulator auto machines, test products, handlers, tapings, auto loaders, solder dippings, epoxy dispensing products, insert tubes, manu press, and parts. In addition, the company offers package molds, such as resistors/diodes and sim/flash drives; and automated machineries, including photo couplers, high powers, semiconductors, LEDs, and IRMs, as well as engages in solar energy business. It serves manufacturers of electronic parts and semi-conductors. Single Well Industrial Corporation was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.77, Zhong Shan Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 235
